definition: to focus
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
surname Jiao
burnt/scorched/charred/worried/anxious/coke/abbr. for 焦耳[jiao1 er3], joule
microfocus x-ray computed tomography (microCT)

sentences.english: However, the present studies focus on the successes of Yong-Cheng.
sentences.chinese: 然而，综观目前研究，学者多聚焦于雍正帝的功业。

sentences.english: Our primary focus is getting the feature code completed on time.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主要聚焦点是使重要的代码按时完成。

sentences.english: He seemed to relish the pressure and focus that had eclipsed his predecessors.
sentences.chinese: 安帅对压力和聚焦的把握能力让他的前任黯然失色。

sentences.english: which is definitely focusing on the business crowd, on people with their careers.
sentences.chinese: 这里主要聚焦的是商业人群，更适合相关行业人士。

sentences.english: Doesn`t reading in poor light make the eyes focus more and cause myopia to increase?
sentences.chinese: 在暗光下阅读，不会使双眼过度聚焦，引起近视加重？

sentences.english: A. But no matter. The Lakers were relevant once again.
sentences.chinese: 但是无论如何，湖人又一次成为聚焦点。

sentences.english: Consider whether you want the background in focus or nice and blurry.
sentences.chinese: 然后考虑景深深浅让背景聚焦清晰或模糊虚化。

sentences.english: In the waking state it focuses in physical reality.
sentences.chinese: 它在清醒状态时聚焦于物质实相。

sentences.english: The material polymerizes and solidifies at the focused spots.
sentences.chinese: 该材料聚合并固化的聚焦点。

sentences.english: The extra wobble and zoomed-in focusing would make a viewfinder very welcome here.
sentences.chinese: 额外的摆动和放大的聚焦会使取景器非常欢迎。

sentences.english: The algorithm reduces mountain climbing steps, and enhances auto-focus speed.
sentences.chinese: 该算法能够减少爬山步数，可提高自动聚焦速度。

sentences.english: It focused on exploring the impacts from the family-of-origin on the intimate relationship and rebuilding the Self.
sentences.chinese: 聚焦在原生家庭对亲密关系的影响和重建自我。

sentences.english: It's my pleasure to stand here and give all of you a speech concetrate on the English name of our country.
sentences.chinese: 我很荣幸站在这里发表聚焦我们祖国英文名的演讲。

sentences.english: The United States imports focusing mirrors and metal mirrors, cutting and strong.
sentences.chinese: 采用美国进口聚焦镜和金属反射镜，切割力强。

sentences.english: There is one immolation and it focuses its attention in various dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 有一个自卧冬它将其留意力聚焦于不同的维度。

definition: to concentrate/to centralize/to focus/centralized/concentrated/to put together
to revolve around/to center on (an issue)
to put effort into sth/to try really hard
to take aim at/to target
to stick closely to (a topic or theme etc)
to be oriented towards/orientation
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
to put emphasis on/to stress
to focus/to concentrate/to give one's full attention
to face/to turn towards/to incline to/geared towards/catering for/-oriented/facial feature/appearance/aspect/facet
viewpoint/angle on sth/perspective
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
to extend/to stretch out/ductable/to scale/scalable
deep plowing/thorough penetration/thorough development (of a market segment etc)
convergence/to come together
